projects.title: AiMod - Agentic AI DataOps Platform
projects.description: Malaysia's first homegrown agentic AI DataOps & MLOps platform that automates data pipeline management and machine learning workflows.

projects.title: Income Estimation & Loan Screening ML Models
projects.description: Developed machine learning models for income estimation with ~25% MAPE and loan screening with 0.75 AUC using XGBoost, processing 6TB of financial data.

projects.title: E-commerce Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Built an item recommendation system that doubled average sales uplifts for key accounts, serving 300+ stakeholders through interactive web dashboards.

projects.title: Automated Data Quality Monitoring System
projects.description: Developed Python utility scripts for real-time data quality monitoring and buyer behavior segmentation analysis using mobile app usage data.
